title: J.R. Majewski Appears To Lie About His Military Service | Christiane Amanpour & Tyler Perry
itunes:title: J.R. Majewski Appears To Lie About His Military Service | Christiane Amanpour & Tyler Perry
description:
GOP candidate J.R. Majewski appears to lie about his military service, Christiane Amanpour discusses her interview with Iran's president, and Tyler Perry talks about "A Jazzman's Blues."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
